original_text: And he left the oxen, and ran after Elijah, and said, Let me, I pray thee, kiss my father and my mother, and then I will follow thee. And he said unto him, Go back again: for what have I done to thee?
korean_text: 그가 소를 버리고 엘리야에게로 달려가서 이르되 청하건대 나를 내 부모와 입맞추게 하소서 그리한 후에 내가 당신을 따르리이다 엘리야가 그에게 이르되 돌아가라 내가 네게 어떻게 행하였느냐 하니라

sentences.original_text: and said, Let me, I pray thee, kiss my father and my mother
sentences.korean_translation: 말하기를, 내가 부모에게 작별 인사를 하게 하소서

sentences.original_text: and then I will follow thee
And he said unto him, Go back again
for what have I done to thee?
